top_product: Sheet Metal Cabinets Progressive Tools for metal parts Machining jobs in SS, Aluminium, Titanium, Inconel, MS, Plastic (PTFE,Nylon, Delrin, ABS)
ideal_referral: Companies like Bosch, Wipro, Legrand, Schneider, Molex, Aptiv, GE, Tesla, HP, Delly, companies in EV segment who need high volume high precision components.
top_problem_solved: Vguard Industries Limited had moved to sheet metal enclosures during 2012-2013 and we did the prototype and pilot production of their stabilizer cabinets. We have had serious problem in doing volume - max was 240 to 300 nos per day using 2 machines. When the same product was moved to production, idea was put forward and sample was submitted to remove the additional corner fixing plate and this material was created in the main frame itself using an joggling operation. This was accepted prima facie and with this change, we were able to do production of about 2100 to 2400 nos per shift using the same two machines. This change has become a standard now in all their sheet metal designs.
my_favourite_bni_story: We got a casual enquiry on display stand for displaying electrical items in January 2021 from one of our members. By March 2021, we were asked to submit a prototype. Sample was approved by April 2021 and got the first order for 600 units, followed by many more. By December 2022, we got order for over 4000 units and thank you note close to about 1.4Crores. This segment was totally new to us and our first one which was very fruitful. Thank You BNI

Lack of Performance Tracking & Reality Checks Offering complete marketing consultation plans, evaluating performance, and ensuring strategies align with real-world results.
my_favourite_bni_story: My journey into BNI started with my clients. Their success brought me here. One of my clients, Mehaboob, struggled to push his new store. We created a short-term marketing plan, and within weeks, he saw a significant boost in sales. He went from hand-picking laptops to running a bulk quantity business. Stories like his reinforce why I do what I do, and BNI allows me to help more businesses grow the right way.
